Yani Resources delivers specialised electrical and instrumentation services for industrial mining, energy and infrastructure projects. Our qualified and experienced technicians combine technical expertise with safety, quality and cultural integrity, supporting clients across installation, maintenance and commissioning phases, ensuring compliance with Australian Standards.

  • High & low voltage installations
  • Switchboard design & fabrication
  • Power distribution systems
  • Preventative & reactive maintenance
  • Solar & battery storage
  • Instrument installation & calibration
  • Process control, SCADA, PLC & DCS support
  • Testing & commissioning (FAT/SAT, loop, RCD checks)

We combine reliable industry expertise with Indigenous participation, delivering safe, certified and dependable E&I solutions.

Yani Resources provides skilled and dependable labour hire solutions to support construction, mining, infrastructure and government projects. Our workforce is fully vetted, site-ready and adaptable, ensuring seamless integration with client teams while supporting Indigenous employment pathways. We focus on reliability productivity and long-term capability on every site.

  • General site labour & maintenance support
  • Trades Assistants across multiple disciplines
  • Landscaping and Scaffolding
  • Materials handling, packing and logistics
  • Machinery and equipment operation
  • Tool store, yard and workshop support roles

Providing safety-focused workers aligned to site protocols, we deliver workforce stability while creating Indigenous employment and training pathways.
